reviews.review_msg: He studies terrorism for 40 years and expects you to be on the same knowledge level after a 2 hour lecture.

Great prof. Very nice and understanding of everything. Structured the class well. Marking was fair. Final was fair as well however it was the longest exam I have ever written. Would recommend him (in class).

He tries to make a lot of jokes, but they aren't funny. Ultra conservative opinions. Really nit-picky about word usage and referencing in papers, but marks pretty easy considering. Provides partial notes online so you don't have to write so much in class. Given the choice, I wouldn't take another class with him, but it was a decent experience.

I think Barry was pissed at all the theories on bullies and youth violence etc. His mistake was  he tried to hard to influence us to kind of agree with him. His material was vast and interesting but Barry was not at his best!

Funny/Nice guy, but class was quite boring even though it had so much potential to be great. His teaching method of using power point while students copy the notes is worthless and boring. Final exam was fair, but I'm not too sure about the mid term paper :S. Overall, I would give him a 6.5/10. I would take him again if I had to.
Barry is a great instructor. He makes the material interesting. He uses power point. Told a few funny jokes. I found the course to be really interesting. I highly recommend him.
I like his no **** style. Refreshing to have a prof that does not sugarcoat everything.

Ehor is disorganized and completely unprepared, his lectures have no point, and he tells the same stupid stories over and over again. He's rude, interpupts people's presentations, and gives a quiz then decides not to mark it - lazy!!
he is very unorganized and talks off talk a lot

While Brenda's teaching methods are not what we are used to as upper-division students, she is such an amazing and caring woman who really wants you to succeed. Step outside of your boxes in this class because what she does is not traditional, but that is not a bad thing at all. If you're flexible and willing to do the actual work, you'll do great

Brenda is an awesome teacher! She takes a different approach, it's refreshing. She knows what she's talking about and he classes are very interesting. However, she is very unorganized and does not respond to emails. Sometimes expectations for assignments are unclear and there was not much structure to her class. Don't let that discourage you tho!

Brenda is clearly very passionate about what she teaches. This class was RJ in schools. Classes are interesting, however Brenda is very disorganized and often does not post assignment instructions until a few days before they are due. There is a lot of group work in this class, which is mostly a good thing. Brenda is a good prof, but disorganized
